profileText: a Representative from Ohio; born in Mahoning County, Ohio, March 11, 1969; graduated from Poland Seminary High School, Poland, Ohio; graduated from Emerson College, Boston, Mass., 1991; business executive; member of the Leetonia Exempted Village School District board of education, Leetonia, Ohio, 2009-2017; member of the Ohio state senate, 2019-2024; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Bill Johnson (June 11, 2024-present).
